feed.title: BCD-watch: Changes Report (weekly)
feed.subtitle: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 29 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 22 September 2025 through Monday, 29 September 2025üîó

Browser Support Changes: +1, -0

Support increases (1)

CSS

  1. css ‚ûû selectors ‚ûû active-view-transition
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 8

Show all 8 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (4)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 19 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

CSS

  1. css ‚ûû properties ‚ûû position-area ‚ûû span-left
    Backfilled for Chrome  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines
  2. css ‚ûû properties ‚ûû position-area ‚ûû span-right
    Backfilled for Chrome  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions ‚ûû api ‚ûû cookies ‚ûû Cookie ‚ûû expirationDate
    Backfilled for Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  2. webextensions ‚ûû api ‚ûû cookies ‚ûû set ‚ûû expirationDate
    Backfilled for Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines

New entries (4)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 19 September 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (‚ÄúRemoved BCD entries‚Äù) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

CSS

  1. css ‚ûû properties ‚ûû position-area ‚ûû span-left
  2. css ‚ûû properties ‚ûû position-area ‚ûû span-right

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions ‚ûû api ‚ûû cookies ‚ûû Cookie ‚ûû expirationDate
  2. webextensions ‚ûû api ‚ûû cookies ‚ûû set ‚ûû expirationDate

Removed entries (0)

No features were removed from bcd in this time period
  • Previous report: Monday, 22 September 2025

BCD Watch: A service of

Subscribe: RSS ‚Ä¢¬†Atom ‚Ä¢¬†JSON

This report was generated by diffing v7.1.7 (Friday, 19 September 2025) and v7.1.8 (Friday, 26 September 2025)

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 22 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 15 September 2025 through Monday, 22 September 2025üîó

Browser Support Changes: +30, -0

Support increases (30)

API

  1. api ‚ûû CSSStyleProperties
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines
  2. api ‚ûû CSSStyleProperties ‚ûû cssFloat
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines
  3. api ‚ûû Document ‚ûû moveBefore
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines
  4. api ‚ûû Document ‚ûû startViewTransition
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  5. api ‚ûû DocumentFragment ‚ûû moveBefore
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines
  6. api ‚ûû Element ‚ûû moveBefore
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines
  7. api ‚ûû GPUAdapterInfo ‚ûû isFallbackAdapter
    Added to Safari  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  8. api ‚ûû GPUDevice ‚ûû importExternalTexture ‚ûû videoframe_source
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  9. api ‚ûû RTCDataChannel ‚ûû closing_event
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  10. api ‚ûû RTCDataChannel ‚ûû transferable
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  11. api ‚ûû ViewTransition
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  12. api ‚ûû ViewTransition ‚ûû finished
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  13. api ‚ûû ViewTransition ‚ûû ready
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  14. api ‚ûû ViewTransition ‚ûû skipTransition
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  15. api ‚ûû ViewTransition ‚ûû updateCallbackDone
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  16. api ‚ûû Performance ‚ûû interactionCount
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines
  17. api ‚ûû SpeechRecognition ‚ûû phrases
    Added to Chrome  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines
  18. api ‚ûû SpeechRecognitionPhrase ‚ûû SpeechRecognitionPhrase
    Added to Chrome  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines
  19. api ‚ûû SpeechRecognitionPhrase
    Added to Chrome  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines
  20. api ‚ûû SpeechRecognitionPhrase ‚ûû boost
    Added to Chrome  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines
  21. api ‚ûû SpeechRecognitionPhrase ‚ûû phrase
    Added to Chrome  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ‚ûû properties ‚ûû view-transition-name ‚ûû match-element
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http ‚ûû headers ‚ûû Permissions-Policy ‚ûû aria-notify
    Added to Chrome  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines
  2. http ‚ûû headers ‚ûû Permissions-Policy ‚ûû on-device-speech-recognition
    Added to Chrome  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines

JAVASCRIPT

  1. javascript ‚ûû builtins ‚ûû Map ‚ûû getOrInsert
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines
  2. javascript ‚ûû builtins ‚ûû Map ‚ûû getOrInsertComputed
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines

    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines
  4. javascript ‚ûû builtins ‚ûû WeakMap ‚ûû getOrInsertComputed
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver ‚ûû bidi ‚ûû emulation ‚ûû setScreenOrientationOverride
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines
  2. webdriver ‚ûû bidi ‚ûû emulation ‚ûû setLocaleOverride ‚ûû updates_existing_sandboxes
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 106

Show all 106 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (58)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 12 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 15 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 8 September 2025 through Monday, 15 September 2025üîó

Browser Support Changes: +3, -0

Support increases (3)

API

  1. api ‚ûû Document ‚ûû ariaNotify
    Added to Chrome  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines
  2. api ‚ûû Element ‚ûû ariaNotify
    Added to Chrome  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html ‚ûû elements ‚ûû input ‚ûû type_color ‚ûû accepts_css_colors
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 19

Show all 19 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (10)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 5 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api ‚ûû PerformancePaintTiming ‚ûû toJSON
    Backfilled for Chrome  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ‚ûû properties ‚ûû text-autospace ‚ûû auto

    Backfilled for Chrome  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http ‚ûû headers ‚ûû Supports-Loading-Mode ‚ûû fenced-frame
    Backfilled for Chrome  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines

New entries (6)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 5 September 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (‚ÄúRemoved BCD entries‚Äù) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 29 August 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 01 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 25 August 2025 through Monday, 1 September 2025üîó

Browser Support Changes: +6, -0

Support increases (6)

WEBDRIVER

Show all 35 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (19)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 22 August 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.
